job-experience: Have you had experience working with other internet service companies?
job-msg: Rahanet Company In order to develop its activities in the field of technology and communication, requests cooperation from all creative and expert people. Applicants active in this field should send a summary of their records to hr@rahanet.af or fill out the form below.
request-service-message: To request a commercial service, send us the following information through the form. Our colleagues will contact you as soon as possible.
chat-login: For chatting With our customer service, you must be login to system.
customer-complaint: Dear subscriber, you can share your criticisms and objections with us through one of the following methods
complaint-attention: Note that only complaints that are completed with reliable information will be considered.
